General.Name: Renforth Resources Inc
General.Description: Renforth Resources Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for nickel, cobalt, copper, and zinc. It owns interests in the Surimeau District battery metals property in Quebec; Parbec gold deposit, a surface gold deposit in Malartic, Quebec; and the Nixon-Bartleman property that hosts gold located to the west of Timmins Ontario. The company was formerly known as Wycliffe Resources Inc. Renforth Resources Inc. was incorporated in 1945 and is headquartered in Pickering, Canada.
General.Address: Unit 1B 955 Brock Road, Pickering, ON, Canada

1.Name: Mr. Kyle Michael Appleby C.A., CPA, CA, CPA
